title: [SOLVED]820-3437 SSD not detect
message:
Hello everybody

I m working on can not detect SSD problem macbook air 13" . Not see liquid damage sign, tested known good two different SSD, cleaned connector with degreaser solution , SSD little warming. 

PP3V3_S0SW_SSD is ok
Replaced U3710 , U3711 , U3740 nothing changed 

Any idea for next step?

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 SSD not detect
message: Check caps in PCIe data lines, probably one chipped off.

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 SSD not detect
message: Thank you [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  replaced all caps on data line and re-solder SSD connector its working :cool:
